The Lord of the Rings 1977 Calendar

wikitext.*:
{{book | title=J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1994 | image = J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1994.jpg | illustrator=[[Michael Kaluta]] | publisher=[[HarperCollins]] (UK) | date=[[12 July]] [[1993]] | format=Wire-bound calendar with mailer | pages=14 | isbn=0-261-10286-9 | precededby=[[The Tolkien Calendar 1993]] | followedby=[[J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1995]] }} The '''''J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1994''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[HarperCollins]] on [[12 July]] [[1993]]. It features art by [[Michael Kaluta]] based on ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''. ==Illustrations== * Cover - "[[:File:Michael Kaluta - Arwen and King Elessar.jpg|Arwen and King Elessar]]" * January - "[[:File:Michael Kaluta - Gandalf Arrives in Hobbiton.jpg|Gandalf the Grey Arrives in Hobbiton]]" * February - "[[:File:Michael Kaluta - Elrond Recalls the Host of Gilgalad.jpg|Elrond Recalls the Hosts of Gil-Galad]]" * March - "[[:File:Michael Kaluta - Legolas Draws the Bow of Galadriel.jpg|Legolas Draws the Bow of Galadriel]]" * April - "[[:File:Michael Kaluta - The Entmoot.jpg|The Entmoot]]" * May - "[[:File:Michael Kaluta - Eowyn Before the Gates of Meduseld.jpg|Éowyn Before the Doors of Meduseld]]" * June - "[[:File:Michael Kaluta - The First Stroke of Lightning at Helm's Deep.jpg|The First Stroke of Lightning at Helm's Deep]]" * July - "[[:File:Michael Kaluta - The Black Gate is Closed.jpg|The Black Gate is Closed]]" * August - "[[:File:Michael Kaluta - The King Recrowned.jpg|The King Recrowned]]" * September - "[[:File:Michael Kaluta - Theoden Espies the Serpent Banner.jpg|Théoden Espies the Serpent Banner]]" * October - "[[:File:Michael Kaluta - Eowyn and the Witch-King of Angmar.jpg|Éowyn and the Witch-King of Angmar]]" * November - "[[:File:Michael Kaluta - Arwen and King Elessar.jpg|Arwen and King Elessar]]" * December - "[[:File:Michael Kaluta - Meriadoc the Magnificent and the Children of Samwise Hamfast.jpg|Meriadoc the Magnificent and the Children of Samwise Hamfast]]" ==Variants== File:J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1994 (German).jpg| '''''J.R.R. Tolkien Kalender 1994'''''
Language: German
Publisher: Laurin
